course_description: Special theory of relativity, wave and particle properties of electromagnetic radiation and matter, introduction to quantum mechanics, Schrodinger equation, atomic models, and simple molecules.
prerequisites: This course requires PHYS 142 OR PHYS_OX142 OR PHYS 152 OR PHYS_OX152 AND MATH 112, MATH 112Z, OR MATH_OX112 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
